text_block_list.text: Special Week and I went to a summer camp. The issue is…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uweeh ~ ~ ~ I-It's blazing hot.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But I've got to train hard… to win my races! 
But the heat… really is too much…

The fire inside her seemed to be put out 
by the summer heat. To motivate her…
choice_data_list: Let's hit the festival tonight and grab soem nice food.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Festival… Nice food!?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Say, you reckon they've got buttered 
potatoes!? It's a festival classic!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hurray!! I'm feeling all pumped up now! 'Kay, let's get it on!

Special Week then threw herself into 
her training. Subsequently…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Woooah! So many people, so many stalls…! It's my first time 
going to such a bustling festival.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Where should I start~?…Ah, buttered potatoes! 
Let's start from there right away!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Pwaaah ~ ~ What a treat~ Buttered potatoes are always delicious, 
no matter where you are in the country!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Anyways, next up, there's this "Horse 
Girl Castella" over there- Huh?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's Grass-chan and her group! Can I go have a little chat?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Thank you! Off I go!
( Thud! )

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Uwaah! I'm sorry I ran into you!! Whoa, gahh! 
There are crowds left, right and center!

Having been caught in the crowd, Special 
Week was brought to a standstill.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh, Trainer-san?

I spotted a passageway which wasn't as busy, 
and so I guided Special Week through.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Phew~ W-We made it through~ Thank you so much, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I will! Heeeey, Grass-chaaaaaan!!

As I waited for the girls to wrap up their conversation, I bought 
a couple "Horse Girl Castellas" for good measure.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I'll catch you later!…Trainer-san, 
sorry to have kept you waiting!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
—Wait, huh? Sniff, sniff… What a sweet smell! Don't tell me you 
have them in this bag, do you…!?
choice_data_list: It's what you wanted to eat.
It's what you wanted to eat.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wow! The Horse Girl Castella ~ ~!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: So you bought them for me, Trainer-san! Uwaaah, I'm so happy ~ ~!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I'll buy you something in return! What 
should I get… Oh? That stall there-

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! Trainer-san, I found just the stall for you!
To savour Special Week's gift, we went to the beach.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Mmmm~! The Horse Girl Castella was so good~! Just 
3 seconds, and I already nommed it all.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
( Chuckles ) It's really refreshing seeing all those "Horse Girls 
Whatever" products. We never had those in my hometown…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
How are you liking yours, Trainer-san? How does 
your "Hokkaido milk shaved ice" taste?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad you liked it! Ah, make sure you eat it slowly, okay? If 
you eat it too quickly, you'll get brain freeze…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Also, I wanted you to take your time 
and savour the flavors of my home!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! Anyway, there really is this mystique with festival foods.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Even the most mundane of foods, like yakisoba or buttered 
potatoes, can taste like heaven, don't they?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I often brought this up to Mom too, "It's such a mystery, isn't 
it?"…But now, the mystery has finally been unraveled.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
That's because in a festival, where people have good times, we 
get to eat with the people we love, I'd say!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ( Chuckles ) How is Mom doing, I wonder.
choice_data_list: You want to meet her, right?
You want to meet her, right?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Well, I do. Things like this really remind me of her.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But I don't feel sad or lonely anymore. After all -

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I love my days in Tracen Academy!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I found my favourite ramen place, my favourite spots in town, and 
I also made some precious friends!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
That's why… I found even the castella 
I just ate very delicious.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I'm really glad that I mustered the courage to come to the 
Academy, and to have you scout me!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe! I'll train as hard as I can tomorrow! Now that my stomach 
is all stuffed, all that's left now is a good night sleep-

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Wha, look at the time!! I'm gonna break 
curfew if we don't get a move on!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
B-But your shaved ice, there's still…! 
And I still want you to savour it…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ah, if we eat it together, then maybe…!…No, I can't! That's 
no better than saying I want to eat it…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? C-Can I? You mean it, right? Alright~! Just leave it to me!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Without further ado, I'm digging in~ ♪

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Mmmmm ~!! It's so crunchy~ ~!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
That's exactly the taste… of the milk 
I drank in Hokkaid- Hygughh!!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: O-Owww… M-My head… I got… the brainfreeze…

Afterwards, I lent Special Week my shoulder, and we somehow 
managed to make it back to the dorm…
